title: Gonna need a little clarification on this
body: Now I'm not the best at math, but I think something is a little off here...

replies.body:
Wait... since *when* can you get **negative** LP??????

I was never Bronze 5, -70 LP. Or even -1 LP.
You can only get negative LP from dodging queues. If you are simply losing games you will never go below 0.

> [{quoted}](name=Percival9,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=gUIylogR,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2017-05-31T10:12:08.627+0000)
>
> Wait... since *when* can you get **negative** LP??????
> 
> I was never Bronze 5, -70 LP. Or even -1 LP.

One of my accounts was at -153lp because people kept trolling in my games and I had to dodge because Riot is incompetent and caters to the brainless trolls.
you dodged on 0 LP giving you -3.
I never dodged though? My duo partner did beforehand I think when he forget to ban, did that mean we both lost LP???

Surely thats not a thing....

no....

Why....
I'm punished for another persons mistake.....

Because if you weren't it would be too abuseable. Just get a friend to play with you on a smurf and if you don't like a game, dodge it for free. It's not ideal for scenarios like yours but unfortunately the abuse cases outweigh the costs to regular players when something like this happens.

If you're going to punish innocents because someone else dodged.
Then don't force a dodge on failing to lock in a champion!

That solves both problems, regular players don't lose LP for harmless mistakes, and free-dodgers still have to press X and are punished.

I have always been opposed to being kicked for not locking in, and now it just sickens me.

It's only if you're partied with them, not like it's just every one on the team. I'd much rather know my team is present and committed than have them remove the lock in requirement for...for what? A minor convenience in rare circumstances? That's just not a good trade off imo.

It doesn't solve the problem with queueing with a throwaway or friend's smurf. It's too abuseable.

Just remember this:
You dodge = -LP (if you have 0 lp)

And I'm pre sure only -lp can be given to Bronze 5 players.
I only know this cause I've had -10lp in Bronze 5.
IM SILVER 4 NOW AND IM REFORMED DON'T HURT ME RIOT.
No I was 0LP bronze 1 so that is false
